name: dead_file.mp3
detailed_description:
dead_file.mp3


Don't have enough time to listen soundtrack in the game? Speically for you, Engine Investigators Engineers created the dead_file.mp3, downloadable content, which allow you to listen dead_file.exe soundtrack everywhere. Enjoy ~7* minutes of music, maded by Rocket Chair.

Contains 5 soundtracks from the dead_file.exe:
  • Escape.mp3
  • Gate.mp3
  • Illuminate.mp3
  • Solution.mp3
  • Wisp.mp3


*Full length of all tracks together is 6 minutes 41 seconds
